events.title: Artist Talk: The Journey of Suhas Roy
events.location: National Gallery of Modern Art, New Delhi
events.address: Jaipur House, India Gate, New Delhi, 110003
events.description: Join us for an intimate evening with renowned artist Suhas Roy as he discusses his artistic journey spanning over five decades. The talk will cover his inspirations, techniques, and the evolution of his distinctive style that has captivated art enthusiasts worldwide.

events.title: Workshop: Traditional Indian Painting Techniques
events.description: A three-day intensive workshop led by Suhas Roy, focusing on traditional Indian painting techniques. Participants will learn about materials, pigment preparation, and the meticulous brushwork that characterizes classical Indian art. Suitable for intermediate to advanced artists looking to expand their technical repertoire.

events.title: Live Painting Demonstration
events.address: 161B, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Kala Ghoda, Mumbai, 400001
events.description: Witness the master at work as Suhas Roy demonstrates his painting techniques live. This rare opportunity allows art enthusiasts to observe the artist's process from sketch to completion. The demonstration will be followed by a Q&A session where attendees can interact with the artist.

events.title: Art and Spirituality: A Conversation
events.address: 40, Max Mueller Marg, Lodhi Estate, New Delhi, 110003
events.description: Suhas Roy joins philosopher Dr. Ramesh Sharma for a thought-provoking conversation on the intersection of art and spirituality in contemporary India. The discussion will explore how traditional spiritual motifs and concepts continue to influence modern artistic expression and how artists navigate these themes in a rapidly changing world.

events.title: Children's Art Workshop: Exploring Colors and Emotions
events.address: Visva Bharati University, Santiniketan, West Bengal, 731235
events.description: A special workshop designed for children aged 8-14, where Suhas Roy will guide young artists in exploring the relationship between colors and emotions. The workshop aims to encourage creative expression and introduce children to the fundamentals of color theory through fun, interactive exercises.

events.title: Masterclass: Portrait Painting
events.description: An intensive three-day masterclass on portrait painting led by Suhas Roy. Participants will learn advanced techniques for capturing likeness, expression, and character in portraits. The workshop will cover various mediums including charcoal, pastel, and oil paint, with personalized guidance from the master artist.

events.title: Art History Lecture: Bengal School and Its Legacy
events.description: Suhas Roy presents a comprehensive lecture on the Bengal School of Art and its enduring influence on Indian art. The talk will trace the movement's origins, key figures, and its evolution through the 20th century, with special emphasis on how it continues to shape contemporary Indian artistic practices.
events.ticketInfo: Free for students with ID, ₹200 for others

events.title: Open Studio Day
events.description: A rare opportunity to visit Suhas Roy's private studio in Santiniketan. Visitors can view works in progress, explore the artist's creative space, and gain insights into his working methods. The artist will be present to interact with visitors and discuss his current projects.
